verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: theGRIO REPORT] - [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: used] [ARG1: his Twitter account] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARG2: to attack the five men convicted -- and later exonerated -- in the Central Park Jogger case in 1989] ...
